java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.saf.handler.AbstractHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractInterfaceHandler
public abstract class AbstractHandler
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides common convenient methods for handler implementations.

getName

public final java.lang.String getName()
Returns a name for the component, reference, service, or interface kind. This string is intended to be suitable for display to an end user.

Returns:
the name of the implementation kind of a component, or the binding kind of an external service or entry point, or the interface kind of an SCA interface.

getDescription

public final java.lang.String getDescription()
Returns text that describes the component, reference, service, or interface kind. This string is intended to be suitable for display to an end user.

Returns:
the description for the implementation kind of a component, or the binding kind of an external service or entry point, or the interface kind of an SCA interface

getSmallIcon

public final java.net.URL getSmallIcon()
Returns the URL for the small icon resource thet represents the corresponding component, service, reference, or interface kind. The image is intended to be suitable for display to an end user.

Returns:
URL for icon resource

getLargeIcon

public final java.net.URL getLargeIcon()
Returns the URL for the large icon resource thet represents the corresponding component, service, reference, or interface kind. The image is intended to be suitable for display to an end user.

Returns:
URL for icon resource

Parameters:

Returns:
a string that combines all property values for this object
